data.title: Reasonable food, huge facility
data.text:
This is a HUGE buffet restaurant, with an amazing array of choices from sushi, Mongolian grill, traditional Chinese, and even basic American standards ... the food is very well prepared and delicious, service is quick and unobtrusive.  Wheelchair accessible, and interesting décor.  

However - they have an ongoing issue with mold.  An hour in the restaurant and I was having breathing issues, and so were the people with me.  We have had this happen before, but had hoped the problem was resolved - but it wasn't.   That is the only reason this is not a highly rated.

data.title: Averagie...
data.text: This place has an excellent location... highly visible from Hwy 360.  They started out great. You would see many Asian people dining here (which is a good sign at a Chinese buffet). They have steadily declined  the past few years. Now the management seems to be doing the minimum just to pay the bills until they can sell the property of get out of the lease... whichever the case. I tried to give them the best review I could because they are nice people, but the truth is that this place barely meets the average mark.
